dmca.title: Complaint about copied website design & hotlinking
dmca.body:
NC


-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, February 08, 2005 11:20 AM
To: support@gofeed.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1



Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: support@gofeed.com <support@gofeed.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date: Tuesday, February 8, 2005, 7:57:16 AM
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement

===8<==============Original message text===============
Hello
 A site hosted with you: http://www.gofeed.info had completely copied my
website design and is hotlinking to my images.The source code was completely
copied and stolen. I have screen shots if needed of how the site was before
I changed image names. I trust you will take care of this quickly. If you
have any questions I can be contacted at 580-255-8066

Suzanne Vieira

===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCCPTEvK/XpJs6oyURAp3VAJ99Cs/cbrMJYf203UTyBCKU9CP4ggCghg23
rB2dQjygSbQ04nJfdjoIxDs=
=HR7j
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
